channel.title: Some help with item bonuses
channel.description:
Ok si u have gone into item.cfg and changed all the stats to what i want. eg:
item = 1478 Amulet_of_accuracy It_increases_my_aim. 10 10 10 150000 150000 150000 10000 150000 100 100 100 100 100 100 100
and i have other ones that are much high like 9999999 but it doesnt seem to give me any bonuses like it shows up when i wear the armour but i dont hit high. i want an item that can give me one hit ko. and my p ring also doesnt work and i didnt even mod that. so please help me. thank you

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @blue12phat blue12phat
item.description:
@blue12phat wrote:

i did. again all that happends is i hit high on npcs. like i can one hit a jad. but i cant get higher than like 20 without mage on real people.

Read full topic

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Replace your amulet of accuracy with mine, and then save and compile (just in case) then restart server.

Read full topic

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

What source are you using?

Read full topic

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @blue12phat blue12phat
item.description:
@blue12phat wrote:

ok i really need some help here guys! i am waiting for some coding master to take some time out of his busy coding day to help me

Read full topic

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:2, topic:193405”]Add this command into client.java:

if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerRights == 3) { String nam = command.substring(4); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.ApplyDead(); victim.sendMessage("You have been eaten by "+playerName+"!"); setAnimation(829); }

It kills the person you use it on.

Happy eating :D[/quote]Rofl… Sense of humor for the win.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @blue12phat blue12phat
item.description:

i have heard people say things like adding it to my client.java files do i have to do that?

item.title: Some help with item bonuses

item.description:
@blue12phat wrote:

ok i did that but it only hit high on npcs it wont hit high on players

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Replace that with this:

item = 1478   Amulet_of_accuracy   It_increases_my_aim.   10   10   10    150000   150000   150000   10000   150000   100   100   100   100   100   100000   100

What you did was increase the Attack bonuses. The second to last digit is the Strength bonus.

Don’t mind Primadude, he has never been taught how to read.

Read full topic

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @blue12phat blue12phat
item.description:
@blue12phat wrote:

i already can kill them but i want to do it when i am fighting [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 10:39:55 AM[/size][hr]i have mage spells that can do that but i want like a working p ring

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

That command instantly kills the person you use it on…

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @blue12phat blue12phat
item.description:
@blue12phat wrote:

i want to be able to kill them not eat them[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 10:36:07 AM[/size][hr]i want a one hit ko well maybe just a high hit like 85

Read full topic

item.title: Some help with item bonuses
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Add this command into client.java:

if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerRights == 3) { String nam = command.substring(4); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.ApplyDead(); victim.sendMessage("You have been eaten by "+playerName+"!"); setAnimation(829); }

It kills the person you use it on.

Happy eating

Read full topic
